.. _`design_system_components_attributes`:

Attributes
==========

.. figure:: images/component_attributes.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

A panel displaying object data in textual form. The attribute set is configurable in the frontend via an :ref:`design_system_components_organizer`.


API Documentation
-----------------

:ref:`cs-web-components-base-components.objectwidgets.Attributes.Attributes`


Related Components
------------------

:ref:`design_system_components_objectheader`
